name: Dice & Dragons - Extended
description:
Dice & Dragons - Extended is updated version of the original GMTK 2022 Game Jam version (https://damienkusters.itch.io/dice-dragons)

New Content:

  • Ascention system for aquiring permanent upgrades across runs
  • Greatly extended the enemy encounters
  • Enemy shields
  • Saving & Loading (via importing)
  • Improved the 'Dungeon Master' upgrade
  • Reworked the 'Dice Tower' upgrade; It will now decrease the maximum rolling time of dice
  • The 'Contract' upgrade can only be purchased if the requested enemy boss has been defeated
  • Dice briefly show their damage if re-rolled
  • The 'Upgrade dice' upgrade now has a level cap
  • Rebalanced the game
  • Improved UI, animations and sound
  • No dragons have been added

* IMPORTANT FOR FIREFOX USERS *
It is concidered a safety concern if the game can access your computer's clipboard for pasting the safe data for importing. Firefox will not allow this by default and must be configured manually in Firefox's settings.

Solution:

  1. Configure Firefox flag --> Type about:config in the address bar
  2. Search for dom.events.asyncClipboard.readText
  3. Set the value to true.

Known bugs:

  • The dice order can get shuffled upon loading a save.
  • Importing a save, after invalid save data has been imported before, will break the rolling of the dice. This can be fixed by exporting your save data, re-load the webpage and re-import your save. No progress should be lost.
